MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL32 postcode area of Conwy, affecting properties in Llechwedd and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still without power. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a grounded overhead line and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:40PM 26th December 2020
